definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
people who don't belong together, don't get to live together (idiom)/marriages are predestined/people marry because they share common traits
pinyin: bu4 shi4 yi1 jia1 ren2 bu4 jin4 yi1 jia1 men2
containing_words.word: 不是一家人不进一家门

sentences.english: The Browns are all college graduates.
sentences.chinese: 布朗一家人都是大学毕业生。

sentences.english: The Huang family went to the countryside for vacation.
sentences.chinese: 黄家一家人去乡下渡假。

sentences.english: Mackinac Island is an easy place for families to explore.
sentences.chinese: 麦基诺岛也很适合一家人探险。

sentences.english: You picture the family by the fire, the student lighting and relighting his pipe.
sentences.chinese: 想到围坐在炉火旁的一家人，一个不断点烟斗的学者。

sentences.english: Now, one family is sitting in front of the door to enjoy the cool, chat, full moon, eat moon cakes.
sentences.chinese: 此刻，一家人正坐在门前乘凉，聊天，望月，吃月饼。

sentences.english: Rick goes to the shed and picks up the Bauers.
sentences.chinese: 里克驾车来到小木屋，搭载了鲍尔一家人。

sentences.english: The whole family is rotten to the core.
The Smiths are my good friends.
sentences.chinese: 史女人一家人是我的好伴侣。

sentences.english: Moren Jie phone means that people on the one.
sentences.chinese: 没人接电话意味着一家人都外出了。

sentences.english: The Lis are going to the country park.
sentences.chinese: 姓李的一家人正在去乡村公园的路上。

sentences.english: Families gather on them to watch satellite television and DVDs.
sentences.chinese: 一家人坐在炕上看卫星电视和DVD录相。

sentences.english: While he was gone, the oxen pulled the wagon, with the family inside, through a frozen stream.
sentences.chinese: 它没在那时，牛正拉着车里的一家人穿过冰冻的河面。

sentences.english: We are all the villagers, the village is a family.
sentences.chinese: 我们都是地球村的村民，天南海北都是一家人。

sentences.english: My family and I want to take a trip this summer somewhere in eastern China.
sentences.chinese: 我们一家人这个夏天想去华东地区旅游。

sentences.english: Jack asks the Palmers to pretend that the Senator was killed.
sentences.chinese: 杰克向帕默一家人请求，假装帕默在爆炸中丧生了。

definition: mother and child/parent and subsidiary (companies)/principal and interest
